comments:
I20060124-1115 and I20060125-0800

I updated to HEAD of jdt.core and jdt.ui and got Martin's markerGrouping contribution. I then restarted the runtime eclipse, opened the problems view, and chose the new "Java problem type" grouping -> NPE.

The problem goes away after a full rebuild - I guess it's because the old java problem markers did not have the "category" attribute set. The Problems view should not choke on old markers. Just put them into the undefined bin.
